name: Hunter Legends Of Dungeon
description:
Welcome to the Hunter Legends of Dungeon! Your kingdom is attacked by the skeletons and your people are in danger too, you have been chosen by the king to bring peace to the kingdom and fight with the skeletons. In this survival mission you are trapped into the dungeon so be brave enough and find the way to get out. In this dungeon survival mission you have unlimited fight and use strategy to conquer the Dungeon.


Features for Hunter Legends of Dungeon
- Cave levels with full of action and fighting
- Multiple skeletons to defeat!
- Multiple weapons to fight with enemies
-multiple quests and achievements to conquer!
- Enchant, Reform, Level up, and collect Cash! An abundant new world to explore!
